bug.author: Kimahriman
bug.summary: Dummy command argument wasn't removed from auto-link after download
bug.description:
Auto-linking of downloaded languages was broken in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/commit/7f0ab145e95036a55af4802184a4b1c496557d0a>7f0ab14</denchmark-link> . The dummy argument wasn't removed from the call at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/blob/master/spacy/cli/download.py#L44>https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/blob/master/spacy/cli/download.py#L44</denchmark-link> . I can make a PR for the fix unless it's easier for a maintainer to just fix this quickly. <denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
Operating System: Docker python:3.6 Python Version Used: 3.6.2 spaCy Version Used: Changes made since 2.0.5 Environment Information: Docker python:3.6

comments.comment: Thanks ‚Äì I thought this was fixed in a second PR, but it might have been lost in an unclean merge in between, damn. If you could submit a quick PR, that would be great! üëç
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
